alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 3:09AM PST until December 07 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Snow accumulations 4 to 10 inches, except 1-2 feet above 8000 feet. Ridge winds gusting as high as 100 mph. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and heavy snow rates may produce localized white out conditions. Plan on hazardous boating conditions on Lake Tahoe with wave heights 2 to 4 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
